mapper.select: SELECT fc.id, fc.feed_id, fc.user_id, fc.parent_comment_id, fc.content, fc.created_at, fc.blind_status, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM feed_comment_like fcl WHERE fcl.comment_id = fc.id AND fcl.user_id = #{userId} ) AS like_status, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM feed_comment_like fcl WHERE fcl.comment_id = fc.id ) AS like_count FROM feed_comment fc WHERE fc.feed_id = #{feedId} AND (fc.parent_comment_id = 0 OR fc.parent_comment_id IS NULL) ORDER BY fc.created_at ASC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT fc.id, fc.feed_id, fc.user_id, fc.parent_comment_id, fc.content, fc.created_at, fc.blind_status, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM feed_comment_like fcl WHERE fcl.comment_id = fc.id AND fcl.user_id = #{userId} ) AS like_status, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM feed_comment_like fcl WHERE fcl.comment_id = fc.id ) AS like_count FROM feed_comment fc WHERE fc.parent_comment_id = #{commentId} ORDER BY fc.created_at ASC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feed_comment (feed_id, user_id, parent_comment_id, content) VALUES (#{feedId}, #{userId}, #{parentCommentId}, #{content})
